item.name: Report Data Update
Login
Get Session Variables
Log In Session
Superset SQL
Update RI Sources
SQL Drop Table - RI Sources
SQL Table Creation - RI Sources

urlencoded.value:
CREATE TABLE {{schema}}.ri_sources
AS
SELECT
    DISTINCT LS1.source_gnid,
    CURRENT_DATE AS processed_date,
    TO_UNIXTIME(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS processed_time_unix
FROM gvd_latest.lineup_source LS1
    INNER JOIN gvd_latest.source_xid SX1
        ON LS1.source_gnid = SX1.source_gnid

item.name: Update RI Sources (VOD)
SQL Drop Table - RI Sources (VOD)
SQL Table Creation - RI Sources (VOD)

urlencoded.value:
CREATE TABLE {{schema}}.ri_sources_vod
AS
SELECT
    DISTINCT source_gnid,
    CURRENT_DATE AS processed_date,
    TO_UNIXTIME(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS processed_time_unix
FROM gvd_latest.source_context
WHERE source_context_type = 'VOD'
